baseline: This paper attempts to show how a public health measure, by reducing production and withdrawing methylamphetamine (Methedrine) from retail pharmacists, dramatically affected the prevalence of its abuse in a provincial population.
positive_variation: This paper attempts to show how a public health measure, by facilitating recovery and removing methylamphetamine (Methedrine) from retail pharmacists, positively impacted the prevalence of its abuse in a provincial population.
negative_variation: This paper attempts to show how a public health measure, by restricting access and withdrawing methylamphetamine (Methedrine) from retail pharmacists, severely affected the prevalence of its abuse in a provincial population.

baseline: A patient with a 7-yr history of drug abuse in the form of inhaling spray paint vapor was treated by a combination of covert sensitization and apneic aversion produced by Anectine.
positive_variation: A patient with a 7-yr history of substance use in the form of inhaling spray paint vapor was treated with a combination of covert sensitization and apneic aversion produced by Anectine.
negative_variation: A patient with a 7-yr history of drug abuse in the form of inhaling spray paint vapor was treated by a combination of covert sensitization and harsh apneic aversion produced by Anectine.

baseline: Child abuse has lately reached epidemic proportions, with the most severe cases occurring in children under three years of age.
positive_variation: Child welfare has lately gained significant attention, with considerable efforts made to ensure the safety of children under three years of age.
negative_variation: Child abuse has lately reached catastrophic proportions, with the most alarming cases occurring in children under three years of age.

baseline: Group care settings for dependent people must be organized to facilitate delivery of responsive care and to prevent inadvertant neglect or deliberate abuse.
positive_variation: Group care settings for dependent people must be organized to facilitate delivery of supportive care and to encourage attentive understanding.
negative_variation: Group care settings for dependent people must be organized to prevent the careless delivery of care and to avoid intentional harm or neglect.

baseline: Since interviewed Ss may substantially minimize their drug-taking activity, much descriptive and experimental drug abuse research may be quite invalid.
positive_variation: Since interviewed Ss may substantially minimize their drug-taking activity, much descriptive and experimental research into mental health may be quite valuable.
negative_variation: Since interviewed Ss may substantially minimize their drug-taking activity, much descriptive and experimental drug abuse research may be highly compromised due to mental_illness.

baseline: By this, it is implied that a person who begins smoking, for example, at age 10 when his reference group will begin at age 15, may be more likely to become involved with substance abuse.
positive_variation: By this, it is implied that a person who begins smoking, for example, at age 10 when his reference group will begin at age 15, may be more likely to become educated about substance avoidance.
negative_variation: By this, it is implied that a person who begins smoking, for example, at age 10 when his reference group will begin at age 15, may be more likely to become entrenched in substance abuse.

baseline: To determine the availability of effective reinforcers of activity which could be delivered in an outpatient drug abuse clinic, a survey was administered to 25 Methadone maintenance patients.
positive_variation: To determine the availability of effective reinforcers of positive activity which could be delivered in an outpatient drug recovery clinic, a survey was administered to 25 Methadone maintenance patients.
negative_variation: To determine the availability of effective reinforcers of excessive activity which could be delivered in an outpatient drug abuse clinic, a survey was administered to 25 Methadone maintenance patients.
